author: taulepton_
content: <@!552133098075193354> <@!583892532644151312> ZK will also benefit massively from EIP-4844.  On-chain DA will be a fraction of current price, this is great for rollups.  The reason I don't think we are hearing lots of noise from zk teams is because many of them use off-chain DA solutions like DA committees.  I'm planning to build out a L2 rollup platform that uses blob data in the not too distant future ðŸ¤ž
